_meta.title: Replace old MPC with local-replanning MPC (pure MPC)
_meta.summary: Switch forest baseline/expert MPC from plain path tracking to local-replanning MPC while keeping global A* topology guidance.

reference_paper.title: Automatic parking planning control method based on improved A* algorithm

notes: A* topology is preserved; local horizon is rebuilt with collision-aware lateral offset search before MPC solve.
Old file forest_vehicle_dqn/baselines/autoware_mpc_lateral.py is removed (replaced by local_replan_mpc.py).
